name: THE DOLPHIN NIGHT demo
description:
W A S D to move

Hold LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to hold an item

press E to interact

hold the key and press E at the gate to open it

press the right mouse button to use the special ability

to escape the ball hold D and press the letter A several times

press the left mouse button when controlling the dolphin to throw bubbles (the bubble will be thrown in the direction of the mouse)

double click to return menu after winning or surviving

press tab to see tasks

the dolphin night is a game based on friday the 13th where the dolphin tries to kill the other sea animals and their goal is to escape from the camp

the game is on demo 0.3
